name: GameName
semester: Semester course was taken (S/F) followed by year (YY), ex: S16
controls: list of controls. Not yet formatted or used

IPInfo.ServerAddress: assigned during runtime, should be left as empty string
IPInfo.ServerPort: assigned during runtime, should be left as empty string

ImageLocation: relative path to image. Currently not used
executable: file to execute. If class file, enter <package.className>. If jar file, enter <-jar file.jar
